blogPost.excerpt: Time is the most important thing, save it! You can remove uploading product images from your to-do list, Smart Image Upload handles all of your product images at once.
blogPost.body: Time is the most important thing, save it! You can remove uploading product images from your to-do list, Smart Image Upload handles all of your product images at once.
blogPost.title: Smart Image Upload for Shopify - Bulk upload product images and save your time
blogPost.author: Farid Movsumov

localize.tagline: 批量上传产品图片，节省您的时间

next.excerpt: A procedurally-generated pencil and paper dungeon that you can easily carry in the back pocket of your jeans. Every book is unique, because each page is randomly generated. Levels are generated using Python and Drawbot to create a unique PDF for every copy.
next.title: Paper Apps™ DUNGEON - Randomly generated notebook game

localize.description: 一个程序生成的纸笔地牢，你可以轻松地放在牛仔裤的后口袋里。每本书都是独一无二的，因为每一页都是随机生成的。关卡使用Python和Drawbot生成，为每个副本创建一个独特的PDF。
localize.tagline: 随机生成的笔记本游戏

localize.description: 一個程序生成的紙筆地牢，你可以輕鬆地放在牛仔褲的後口袋裏。每本書都是獨一無二的，因爲每一頁都是隨機生成的。關卡使用Python和Drawbot生成，爲每個副本創建一個獨特的PDF。
localize.tagline: 隨機生成的筆記本遊戲
